research_question: Can readout error mitigation (REM) achieve chemical accuracy on Tuna-9? ZNE failed because gate noise is only ~1.3 kcal/mol of ~7 kcal/mol total. REM targets the remaining >80% from readout errors.
purpose: First VQE experiment with REM correction using calibrated confusion matrices. Compare energy_rem vs energy_postselected to quantify REM improvement.
